title.narrative: Renforcer le traitement et la prévention de la malnutrition aigüe dans les zones d’installations des réfugiés et retournés de la Centrafrique des régions Sud du Tchad

description.narrative: The main objective of this joint project is to prevent and treat malnutrition among 91,000 people in southern Chad, including 64,000 Central African refugees, 15,000 Chadians who have returned from CAR and 12,500 people from host communities. UNHCR, UNICEF, WFP and their partners will use CERF funds to treat 4,000 children with severe and 5,000 with moderate acute malnutrition, nutritionally screen 12,500 children, provide supplementary food to 9,600 children and 2,000 pregnant or breastfeeding women, and provide information on good nutrition practices to 55,000 people. The project will be implemented within 9 months.
